lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: it is the right thing to do & it makes me feel good to have the resources to help
lender.occupational_info: I deal with incoming orders over the telephone. I also attend trade shows a few times a year.

lender.name: Elfi
lender.loan_because: Other than helping a needy neighbor, acquaintance, or beggar, It's the only way that I can help others.

lender.name: Joseph Cangialosi
lender.loan_because: I watched a cable special on the way people were living in these countries. I thought if I were in their shoes, I would like someone to help me get a future for myself and my family started. For the amount of money it cost to help someone in desperate need, everyone in this country should get involved with a program like this.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computer applications that help transfer and retain user knowledge.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it's a privilege to be able to do so...
lender.occupational_info: Healthcare

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: because a little money goes a long way.

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: this system helps individuals and groups become self-supporting without the psychological stigma of having received a "handout." Helping one business not only helps the proprietor, but his/her family and community as well.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people in finding information - any information that they want or need, without asking questions of them or making them aware of my personal opinions.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it seems like the right thing to do?
lender.occupational_info: lacking

lender.name: Jim & Maggie
lender.loan_because: We want to help other business owners.
lender.occupational_info: We make custom designed stationery.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I want to share the blessings I have been given with others.

lender.name: Yumiko
lender.loan_because: I would like to help people who are trying to improve their life. I have been helped by many people so far in my life and I feel strongly that I have to give all those back little by little to some other people who need it !
lender.occupational_info: I am working for a French company in Japan.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Pay it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I provide risk consulting services.

lender.name: Jonah, Suzanne and Scott
lender.loan_because: We respect the entrepreneurial spirit and the need to provide a higher quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: Developing sustainable policies and practices that protect and enhance natural resources for future generations.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: This is a graduation gift to our friend, Jennifer who just graduated from a college with a business degree. We felt it was appropriate to support other young women in their business plans. Jen -we love you,. Congratulations!! Doug and Joanna
lender.occupational_info: helping others

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am a writer and I teach at the college level. A poor graduate student.

lender.name: Armand
lender.loan_because: I want to give other's the opportunity to support themselves and prosper.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a college student at the University of Arizona studying Chinese Forest Policy. I work as a busser at a local restaurant cleaning tables for a living.

lender.name: Douglas
lender.loan_because: I have to. We have to.
lender.occupational_info: I literally live in the past and I love it! Have shovel and trowel, will travel!

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Detailed, fun.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: I am retired--on a fixed income and i want to help in a small way those less fortunate who are trying hard
lender.occupational_info: i am a retired nurse: I worked for 53 years helping people with their illnesses

lender.name: Jeff Maslan
lender.loan_because: it feels good. Great way to run a charity / micro lender. One of my clients is a charity and I really like the blend of social media with giving on Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I help websites get as many viewers as possible.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: My life has been blessed and I want to bless others. This is also a great way to teach my kids the joys of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I market products that test electronics goods -- such as your mobile phone, PC and iPod -- to insure they do what they are supposed to do.

lender.name: Ros
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Sonia e Gianni
lender.loan_because: Questa è la più potente forma di aiuto per migliorare la vita di chi è meno fortunato di noi.
lender.occupational_info: Riparo macchine alimentari

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I believe in the strength of giving people responsibility. And luckily, micro money in my home country is mega money in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: Scientist at a not-for-profit Research and Development Organisation.

lender.name: Katsuya
lender.loan_because: I'd like to know more about tanzania

lender.name: Edgardo
lender.loan_because: I believe that even the little amount of money I can send will contribute in bettering other people's life.
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of the sales dept of my company. We are fasteners distributors.

lender.name: Larry B.
lender.occupation: Sales Management consultant and team builder
lender.loan_because: I am proud to be able to give to give.
lender.occupational_info: I help bless lives by creating success opportunities for people everywhere.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: Everyone should have a chance to succeed by working hard.
lender.occupational_info: Father of four sons. For work, I write computer software.

lender.name: Sannie
lender.loan_because: I'm glad I can help people
lender.occupational_info: Volunteer for WWF and at school

lender.name: henri
lender.loan_because: i want my children to care about the earth and humanity.
lender.occupational_info: i work because i want my children to know that hardwork is a noble thing..

lender.name: Elsa
lender.loan_because: I admire entrepreneurship and the creative solutions people find to support their family and community.

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I think the concept of people helping themselves is excellent! They get to keep their dignity!

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I am a middle class American that has struggled to be where I am today. I am however aware that my struggle cannot be held in comparison to those that do not have the benefits of living in an industrialized nation. It is my duty as a human to share my prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: I teach individuals on how to perfrom tasks and enhance their job skills.

lender.name: Fred
lender.loan_because: I loan because it helps others achieve sustainable livelihoods and improve their lives. I enjoy having the ability to search for people seeking loans by region, gender, etc.
lender.occupational_info: I work in international relief and development, for a faith-based NGO (non-governmental agency).

lender.name: Louise
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: Online handmade marketplace owner with an ecommerce background. Helping artisans make a living doing what they love.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: There but for the grace of God go I.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying the art of writing so that I may someday portray the plights of the meager as well as the joys of life.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Its fun, and I enjoy learning about entrepreneurs around the world who need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: Advise large corporate clients on how to finance their business as well as how to make future acquisitions, divestitures and other M&A activities.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I have so much. My wife and I are blessed with comfort and security. It is an honor to give someone else a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I work behind the scenes in the big theatres in New York.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Loans brought me to where I am today.

lender.name: Deb
lender.loan_because: It's a way to share the blessings I've been given!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the office and support the staff of a pretty large Lutheran congregation on the west coast of the US.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.loan_because: It can make a difference in some ones life.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I loan because making the world a better place is the best investment.
lender.occupational_info: I train teachers to use technology to help their students learn.

lender.name: Robert S
lender.loan_because: Because i've been blessed and given the resources to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a Director for an Internet company in the Washington DC area. My group is responsible for software integration, performance testing and software configuration.

lender.name: eleanor
lender.loan_because: I have been so blessed with loans myself These loans helped me more than financially they helped me spiritually I have achieved and provided so much more than I could have ever imagined .
lender.occupational_info: I Make food look beautifull for advertisment agencys I am hired by them to make thier products look as appealing as possible to attract more purchases I am hired for movies t.v. comercials and magazines

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: i like to help as many people as i can in as many ways i can
lender.occupational_info: i teach and i learn!--in business, in v olunteering--research ethics and palliative care-- and through my own family--two of our children have fatal genetic diseases

lender.name: Dajana
lender.loan_because: I like to support small businesses.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help people protect their ideas.

lender.name: Caitlin & Jason
lender.loan_because: We loan because it is an easy, effective way to help people in other countries start or maintain a business so that they can provide for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: Caitlin is a registered dietitian (RD) at a trauma center in Charlotte, NC. Jason works for a software company as an internal sales representative that provides database software for nonprofit organizations.

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with so much.

lender.name: Alba
lender.loan_because: This is the year my children are learning about the world and about the need of others. It is important that they understand what it is to help others.

lender.name: Tero
lender.loan_because: I have a opportunity to do so!

lender.name: Bernie
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others and I feel it is everyone's duty to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I teach finance to college students.

lender.name: Lynn
lender.loan_because: I loan because I've been blessed to have the life that I have in a country I love. I loan so that others may hopefully realize some of their dreams.

lender.name: Chelsea
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a great way to invest in ending poverty. Teach a man to fish, and you’ve fed him for a lifetime. ...

lender.name: Arya
lender.loan_because: Showing interest in the life of others and giving a helping hand if needed is important, because sometimes our voice isn't enough. We have to show the poor our concern through our actions.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I know there will be a time that I will need help from others and right now is not one of those times, so I believe it is the time for ME to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the skin care industry, I try to help people feel better about themselves by helping them with skin problems. Such as acne, scarring, etc.

lender.name: Kerry
lender.loan_because: the donation was a gift...now I really like watching the progress and re-loaning the money.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I've got a good life and even if I don't have lots of money this way I can share what little I have.
lender.occupational_info: Dull. People yell at me for silly pointless things, but it pays for my life and it's a good life.

lender.name: takayuki
lender.loan_because: i want to help people

lender.name: Gloria
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: sewing

lender.name: Pearl
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to make a better life for themselves, their family, and their community, no matter where they're born.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that people are working in a safe place and are making a decent wage to support their families. I also work to increase job opportunities for people who traditionally have not had access to many jobs.

lender.name: ludovic
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer in a large multinational firm (aerospace).

lender.name: Jay
lender.loan_because: I was brought up in a family that didn't have much. I know how difficult it can be, and would like to help others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: "You will find, as you look back on your life, that the moments that stand out are the moments when you have done things for others." - Henry Drummond
lender.occupational_info: Sitting in front of a computer and paying other people's medical bills.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: my brother got me into it!
lender.occupational_info: I represent people living with HIV/AIDS who could not otherwise afford legal services.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I like to help people. My dad mentioned this to me and told me that this is helping people around the world. I was interested and he helped me create my account and get started. I hope to get friends and family involved.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a young girl going to school. I'm 10 years old and I'm in fourth grade.

lender.name: vincent
lender.occupation: blogger on energy and video education

lender.name: Veronica
lender.loan_because: I believe in Microloans as the fastest more direct way to assist people and countries in need. With regards to Kiva, without all the added overhead that other organizations have to cover from donations.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the finances of an environmental consulting company.

lender.name: Sioux
lender.loan_because: The world isn't a fair place, and Kiva helps people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help managers work more effectively with their people, and businesses improve their performance.

lender.name: Peter & Roni
lender.loan_because: We have been poor ourselves and would love to help someone now if we can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to make electricity and Roni works at home as a wife and mother

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: A drop of water in a bucket will spread ripples to the very outer edges of that bucket, and hopefully by lending to those in need my drop combined with others can be felt around the world.
lender.occupational_info: Jack of all trades. On any given day you can find me who knows where, but I love what I do.

lender.name: Amy and Brent
lender.loan_because: we can. And if we can, why wouldn't we? I would hope others might help us if we were on the other end of this injustice called poverty. Our global society is only as strong as our weakest members - it is the duty of the rest of us to help them out to make the world a better and more balanced place.
lender.occupational_info: Amy is a high school teacher, teaching English and drama. Brent is a mechanical design engineer for a local company that designs gear boxes and other things, mostly for potash and other Canadian mines.

lender.name: Cypress Helping Hand
lender.loan_because: We want to help others to help themselves
lender.occupational_info: I coordinate volunteers who read with school children each day.

lender.name: Pete & Annie
lender.loan_because: We are obligated as humans to improve our global world. I believe we can make a better world through the responsible use of capital. Change will not come soley from governments, but from responible citizens, companies, and creative spirit. Go Kiva!
lender.occupational_info: Pete solves business problems. Annie solves legal problems for prisoners.

lender.name: Norma
lender.loan_because: Everyone can't do everything, but everyone can do something. It makes a lot of "sense" to give a lot of "cents"

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: it's a great way to help people. I'm very business minded and really like seeing these folks build and make something for themselves. Teach a man to fish...
lender.occupational_info: Being an accounting analyst, I pretty much am in charge of following money that flows through the business, making sure it's all there, is going to the right places, and that it is what was agreed upon.

lender.name: Amrei
lender.loan_because: I am impressed by the simplicity of KIVA's concept and the smart business ideas it is supporting. It's not only about giving money, it is supporting and trusting a person and her project to improve its condition. Great!
lender.occupational_info: I am in charge of the legal affairs in an international company, ie espacially working on the contracts with its business partners, be it suppliers or clients.

lender.name: Mary Jo
lender.loan_because: I want to help others help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children that have difficulty in school. I identify what is causing their problems then help set up programs to assist them in learning. I am also a counselor.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I believe that if you give people a chance to help themselves that they will be able to help others.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I admire mothers that would do anything to do for they family.
lender.occupational_info: Not easy,coming from different country & staring from 0,it is not fun,but I am getting there slowly,Hope this women have better life.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have the Lord place me here in this great country of ours and I want to give back part of what He has given me!
lender.occupational_info: I used to be a cook in the US Navy! I have prepared and served a lot of meals in 21 years of service

lender.name: Liz
lender.loan_because: We all have a responsibility to help others. I am fortunate to be in the position where I can give hard-working people a chance to improve their circumstances. The rewards & benefits we can receive from helping others are immeasurable.

lender.name: Peace
lender.loan_because: I think it's a good thing to support people in any way we're able.
lender.occupational_info: Same as any other wife and mom.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Social Studies (History and Cultures) Teacher

lender.name: Kjersta
lender.loan_because: To whom much is given, much is expected.

lender.name: Todd
lender.loan_because: I like the plan of Kiva, people helping others improve their lives, which improves the world. One small step at a time.

lender.name: Fiorenzo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people across the world to better their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I write software.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough that I can! I think this is a great way to give others a leg up in the world, and to foster goodwill across borders.

lender.name: Kate

lender.name: Mara

lender.occupational_info: I am studying biological chemistry in graduate school.

lender.name: LenaRyan
lender.loan_because: I like doing this because I want to be helpful :)

lender.occupational_info: Dad is a teacher, Mom sells medical products, kids are in school.

lender.loan_because: I care. I know that sounds lame but it is true. That is why I give, to change peoples lives for the better.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.loan_because: We want to help people help themselves. We are fortunate to be living in the USA and we believe that everyone should get the opportunity to better their lives.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others as I have been helped.
lender.occupational_info: I work with organizations that help developing countries become better, safer places to live.

lender.name: Safa
lender.loan_because: I will not die an unlived life. I will not live in fear of falling or catching fire. I choose to inhabit my days , to allow my living to open me, to make me less afraid, more accessible, to loosen my heart until it becomes a wing, a torch, a promise. I choose to risk my signifigance, to live so that which came to me as seed goes to the next as bloom, and that which came to me as bloom goes on as fruit." ---Dawna Markova
lender.occupational_info: I am a sister of humanity, a student, a teacher, a social activist, a volunteer, a daughter, a friend, a soon to be student of Social Work.

lender.name: Paul & Brad
lender.loan_because: it's important to do so.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because:
I'd like to help people who are willing to have a go.
me gustaria ayudar gente que quiere trabajar.

lender.name: GMJEC
lender.loan_because: As a family which has travelled, we want to play our small role in helping others improve their lives.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: this is an amazing way to touch the lives of others—I am blessed by this opportunity!
lender.occupational_info: I am part of a marketing team at a company that makes CT scanners. I work with physicians on scientific research to advance the noninvasive detection of heart disease.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: America is so blessed.
lender.occupational_info: Studying to become a lawyer

lender.name: J. J.
lender.loan_because: I believe this provides a much better opportunity for sucess than any amount of funds provided as charity.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Even my small loans can actually have a real impact in a few people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: My work involves helping companies improve the quality of the computer software they create, but my dreams lie far outside the world of business.

lender.name: Sheila
lender.loan_because: I can and because I believe in mutuality.
lender.occupational_info: I hope work my contributes to creating social justice and sustainabilty for all the earth community.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because:
Athletes Takin Action Fund Raiser
http://www.kivafriends.org/index.php/topic,2872.new.html#new

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to need help getting started.

lender.name: Tammee
lender.loan_because: Micro lending supports basic human dignity & creates self-sustaining businesses. Teach a man to fish .....

lender.name: Betyna
lender.loan_because: I think everybody should get a shot at self-sufficiency

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I faced challenges starting my own businesses and want to help others, particularly those raising families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graphic designer and photographer.

lender.name: Chee Chung
lender.loan_because: I believe social causes CAN be served through private sector mechanisms.
lender.occupational_info: I've spent the last 5 years (2002 to 2008) working with social enterprises in Cambodia, hence I understand clearly the constraints these micro-businesses face in raising financing.

lender.name: Chacsam
lender.loan_because: Out of curiosity and because the principle sounds great.

lender.name: Terek
lender.loan_because: It feels good to try and help somebody.

lender.name: Madge
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help other people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I work with setting up different types of health/medical systems that bring needed medicines and health workers to places and people that need them but haven't had any way to get them.

lender.name: Thea
lender.loan_because: I can directly assist people in improving their standard of living
lender.occupational_info: I manage databases that help the people of Oregon learn more about plants growing in the wild

lender.name: Annette
lender.loan_because: it's amazing how far $25 can go towards making someone's dream come true.
lender.occupational_info: I write and edit magazine feature articles and other columns on interior design and architecture.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I have the ability to help people help themselves...

lender.name: pat!
lender.loan_because: Sometimes we don't realize how lucky we are, and this is just to recognize that some people aren't as lucky and they should be given a chance.
lender.occupational_info: Using Information Technology to make businesses more efficient.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I feel bad about the Cubbies.
lender.occupational_info: I can't breath underwater.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I want to provide opportunities and hope.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I sincerely believe that with the right motivation and some resources people are capable of great things. I would like to be a part of those great things whenever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am an internal auditor for GE. I assist the company in validating the integrity of the financial information given to investors.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I know as a business owner, you need money to start up and keep growing your operations. I want to help others realize their dreams and be successful.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own and operate an auto repair business.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: We have been given so very much.
lender.occupational_info: I sit with those who are sick or near death and their families.

lender.name: Adarsh
lender.loan_because: I cant think of a easier way of making the world better
lender.occupational_info: i am a student

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because: we can all help people help themselves.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.occupational_info: I work in business and local politics.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I want to help other make a difference in other people's lives. Money comes and goes but helping other people lasts forever.
lender.occupational_info: I am a college student at Whitman College studying how to make the world a better place!

lender.name: Jerilyn
lender.loan_because: My pastor told us about Kiva in a sermon, I researched it online, and find it a fulfilling way to help others and feel good about myself.
lender.occupational_info: I used to build pacemakers and defibrillators which helps hearts beat correctly.

lender.name: Tanya
lender.loan_because: I would like to see more women around the world fulfill their dream and make the world the world a better place.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Economic growth defeats poverty. (Paul Collier in The Bottom Billion is worth reading. He advocates for this idea.)
lender.occupational_info: I teach mathematics to talented students at the college level.

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: Although I feel 'poor' relative to a lot of people here in America, I still have a good life. I believe in personal empowerment, and want to help other women accomplish their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I write and direct films, and am also a teacher. I teach film and English. The films I write and direct are from a woman's point of view.

lender.name: Clarice
lender.loan_because: everyone is trying their best

lender.name: Christie
lender.loan_because: it is amazing to think that my few dollars are going to help someone build a better life for themselves, their family and their community.

lender.name: Cam and Tiffany
lender.loan_because: it's something we can do to help out a brother or sister around the world. We are all connected and we all need a little help from time to time.
lender.occupational_info: Cam is a manager in a cable/internet communications company, and Tiffany is a pastor.

lender.name: The Avelenda Family
lender.loan_because: We want everyone who wants to run a business to have the opportunity to be successful and make their lives better.

lender.name: Geri
lender.loan_because: I want to help people fulfill their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children from birth to age 18, doing storytimes and crafts with them. Always I encourage them to read, use their imagination, and discover themselves.

lender.name: Bev
lender.loan_because: I am continuing the work begun by a dear friend who passed away January of 2009. It's an wonderful way to honor her memory and carry out her wishes.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it's a good thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a student. I want to be a counselor one day so I can work with adolescents.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: Many people helped me in my life. Therefore I believe it's normal to help other people. By the way, it's interesting to be concerned by something positive happening in a complete different scenary.
lender.occupational_info: I support an electronic device dedicated to satellites remote control and sensing. Customers are spread over the world and work in Space Science or TV broadcast.

lender.name: Min Woo Ro
lender.loan_because: I do what I love.
lender.occupational_info: I invest lot of my time and money in opportunities with great returns to live well and help others. From an investor's point of view, Kiva is a fountain of Win-Win opportunities for humanity.

lender.name: Glenda
lender.loan_because: I am blessed more than I realize and want to share with others who don't have as much.

lender.name: Jamil
lender.loan_because: I feel that we are all responsible for each other in this world. Though I am deeply in debt as a student, it is my responsibility as a beneficiary of all who have come before us and that have made it possible to have what it is that we have in this world, to give and create opportunities for others.
lender.occupational_info: I am a former teacher that has decided to become a medical doctor. I someday hope to be able to help more when I am in a position to do so. I am just an ordinary person that has been blessed and I am borrowing money from the bank so that I can help others, just because I can.

lender.name: Jayakanthan
lender.loan_because: I would like to help the needy.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a Software consultancy company

lender.name: Scott & Jenny
lender.loan_because: We decided we wanted to make a difference in people's lives!
lender.occupational_info: Scott helps people make smart decisions about where to put the money that they already have. Jenny teaches 4th Grade to students with learning disabilities.

lender.name: John R.
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to get to the point where they do not need help.
lender.occupational_info: I taught English Literature to university students for forty years. I saw it not only as a way of getting them to understand and enjoy good writing, but also as a way of opening their minds to new ideas and new ways of seeing the world.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: My money is doing more good this way than it would be if it was just hanging around in a bank account
lender.occupational_info: I study English Language at university

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: it's important to support others' ambitions.
lender.occupational_info: Consulting analyst with Mercer, and a recent graduate of Colgate University in upstate NY.

lender.name: Kevin & Terri
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do. We have been blessed with much and we try to honor God by helping the poor and giving back.
lender.occupational_info: Terri teaches children at a Christian school and Kevin sells medical products.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: everyone should have at least one real chance at their dream.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: because i have visited some of the areas requesting loans and I know how hard the people work to survive. A little blessing goes a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate and blessed.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: Who hasn't been in a time of need?

lender.name: Joaquim
lender.loan_because: I want a better future

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help women especially become economically successful and self sustaining
lender.occupational_info: I teach English to New Canadians.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't have had the chance to grow up in a house or to go to college without loans.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a company that consults non-profits on fundraising

lender.name: Lori & Bucky
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of IT professionals and my husband is a landscape architect.

lender.name: Barrie
lender.loan_because: It connects me to the rest of the world.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I like to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Varied electronics field, including installing and maintaining computers, radios and telephone systems.

lender.name: sasha
lender.loan_because: I am so lucky! I was born in the USA to parents with the means to get me through school with my self confidence intact. And I LOVE Business!
lender.occupational_info: I own a cleaners with 40 employees.

lender.name: Jordon
lender.loan_because: These are real people with structured goals...why wouldn’t you want to be apart of this great drive?
lender.occupational_info: We own and operate the largest agricultural trade show in Canada - Canada's Outdoor Farm Show

lender.name: Recep III
lender.loan_because: I feel that micro-credit is one of the more effective methods of donating
lender.occupational_info: I advise people on where to invest their money to accumulate wealth that will give them financial freedom

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: a little helping hand can get someone great results!

lender.name: Philip
lender.loan_because: I know firsthand how difficult raising funds for a venture can be. I believe micro-loans to be a creative and winning strategy for alleviating poverty and empowering people in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: I own a small, struggling, albeit unique and creative restaurant. There is not much work for teachers like myself in this seasonal touristic area of the U.S.

lender.name: Rich & Karol
lender.loan_because: We want to try and help make a difference.

lender.name: Risha, Singapore
lender.loan_because: I feel very lucky in my life and want to pay it forward.

lender.name: Aidan
lender.loan_because: because if i need help i hope someone would help me
lender.occupational_info: 5 grade student

lender.name: Mr. Sharpe's Classes
lender.loan_because: We want to help some of the people we are learning about in our Social Studies class.
lender.occupational_info: We study maps, read, write, and discuss what is happening in the Eastern Hemisphere.

lender.name: meridyth
lender.loan_because: I care about the lives of other people
lender.occupational_info: I work in a high school teaching English, guidance and careers,computers, ESl, reading, special education and co-operative education .

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to contribute to sustainable development in emerging economies.
lender.occupational_info: I analyze companies for a living. This means I research how the business works and try to understand what the company will do in the future through analyzing its risks and opportunities. My firm will then make an investment in the form of partial ownership (equity) in companies we like.

lender.name: david
lender.loan_because: Its an incredible easy way to make a big difference in the lives of people working hard to try to get ahead.
lender.occupational_info: I work to help businesses reduce their carbon footprint through energy efficient retrofits

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupational_info: I work in a school library and computer lab with children in grades K - 5. We emphasize projects that involve global awareness using 21st century skills.

lender.name: Aimee
lender.loan_because:
Jesus wants me to.
Someday I hope to BE in all these places, helping all these people.

lender.name: Jenni
lender.loan_because: I believe it is a little step that moves our world a long way in the path to becoming a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I help schools in the United States get the supplies they need for students to learn.

lender.name: Joel & Sheila
lender.loan_because: We like to help others make an impact in their communities.
lender.occupational_info: We do photography.

lender.name: Brooke
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself and I am in such awe of the amazing women I've seen profiled on Kiva. It is my intent to keep helping others via this organization as long as I am able. Micro-loans = reduction in poverty.

lender.name: Diego
lender.loan_because: This is sustainable development.
lender.occupational_info: I help ensure that employees are not discriminated.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe that Kiva makes a difference in the world and I really want to be a part of it.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: the loan symbolizes hope for the future for the borrower.

lender.name: Frederic
lender.loan_because: I care about people living in less fortunate countries who want to work hard to improve their living. They do not necessarily have the same opportunities than people like me living in a rich country...
lender.occupational_info: I invest money in financial markets around the world to improve my clients' retirement.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I feel so much more connected when I know exactly where money is going and I can pick out who I can really help.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I can!
lender.occupational_info: I help a family raise their two children. I teach them, feed them, watch them, and guide them.

lender.name: The Goodners
lender.loan_because: Others have helped us in the past. And we know these people will help others too.
lender.occupational_info: As a family we do all kinds of things. One of us is on a software building team; one of us works with medical registry data. One of us loves physics, math and ceramics; another loves drawing, reading and making videos.

lender.name: Luis Enrique
lender.occupational_info: Mi vision es empezar un cyber cafe enfrente de mi casa, en donde pueda ofrecer servicios de mantenimiento y renta de internet, asi como elaboracion de oficios o documentos, unque no sea con mucho equipo deseo de ahi mismo sacarlo adelante para poder agrandar los ingresos poniendo entretenimiento ahi mismo como un salon de billar o algo recreacional. Yo tengo conocimiento de computacion basica y estoy apundo de empezar mi educacion universitaria.

lender.name: Amiizette
lender.loan_because: It offers a hand up rather than a hand out. Everyone no matter gender, faith, education, race, location, or situation deserves the opportunity to share their gifts with the world and live a healthy sustainable lifestyle.
lender.occupational_info: As a photographer, I get to take pictures of horses and riders in the great outdoors of Colorado and Wyoming. I am able to travel, enjoy my family, and capture on film people, places, moments, and anything that catches my eye.

lender.name: Mary Jo
lender.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva account as a Christmas present along with a copy of Muhammad Yunus' book.

lender.name: Juan Pablo
lender.loan_because: I believe that no one is so rich that it can not require help sometimes, or not so poor to help the others.
lender.occupational_info: I have the knowledge and the ability to help your business to create the maximum amount of profits in the shortest period of time and with the less amount of human resources and capital expense.

lender.name: Caithness
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: Family physician

lender.name: Kristine
lender.occupation: Mommy, wife, daughter, small business owner

lender.name: Charlie
lender.loan_because: Micro-loans are the gifts that keep on giving. Plus, I am richly blessed and am simply a steward of my Lord's resources.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the back-office of a savings and loan bank supporting lending operations.

lender.name: hannah
lender.loan_because: i can make a big difference with a small amount of money.

lender.name: Ghulam
lender.loan_because: i donot have sufficient mony for clothing business therefore i requested for loan.
lender.occupational_info: My, work is a kind of business shops of clothes .

lender.name: Michele
lender.loan_because: Knowing I helped a family with achieving their dreams of owning a business, is my way of giving back to the universe,for all the wonderful gifts I have been so fortunate to receive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student , going to school is my gift to myself.

lender.name: Freefroot
lender.occupational_info: I am a giveaway event website that promotes businesses whose participation fees contribute in promoting struggling businesses across the world.
